css: .ham-flex-start{ position: relative; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; align-items: flex-start; width: 50px; height:50px; cursor:pointer; z-index: 9999;} .ham-flex-start> .line-1{ width: 25px; height: 1px; background-color: black;} .ham-flex-start> .line-2{ width: 15px; height: 1px; background-color: black; margin: 5px 0px;} .ham-flex-start> .line-3{ width: 25px; height: 1px; background-color: black;} .zeroOpacity{ transition:.5s; opacity: 0!important} .setOpacity{ transition:.5s; opacity: 1} .rotate-line-1{ transition: 0.3s; transform: rotate(45deg); position: absolute;} .rotate-line-3{ transition: 0.3s; transform: rotate(-45deg); position: absolute;}

.searchbarContainer{ display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; width: 100%; margin: 15px auto 100px auto;} .searchbarContainer input[type="search"]{ width: 100%; padding: 8px 16px; border: 1px solid #c2c2c2; font-family:"Value",sans-serif;} .searchbarContainer input[type="submit"]{ width: fit-content; padding: 9px 16px; background-color: #009eff; border: none; font-family:"Value",sans-serif; font-weight: bold; color: white; text-transform: uppercase; cursor: pointer;}
